about_the_game:
It’s the season for parties, and you’ve got a ticket to the hottest one in town. Leave your helmet at the door for Ajeet’s Winter Bash! In the fourth and final GRID™ Legends premium content pack, you can jump into your favorite car and help celebrate the winter season the GRID Legends way.

Winter has hit hard in GRID Legends, and our very own Ajeet Singh has set up his Winter Bash event to celebrate the way he knows best: fast cars and snowy circuits. With 8 new story events, 3 vehicles, 3 career events, and a huge list of new circuit customization options, can you brave the cold and come out on top?

Those with GRID Legends: Deluxe Edition get instant access to Ajeet’s Winter Bash*. Deluxe Edition players can invite friends to play the pack’s content for free**. Additionally, Winter Bash can be purchased separately.

Here’s everything that’s included:
  • 3 new Vehicles
  • 8 new themed Story Experiences
  • 3 new Career Events unlocked by completing new Sponsor objectives
  • 45 existing routes with a mixture of Ramps & boost gates being added
  • Point-to-point Drift Routes at Okutama
  • Plus new Liveries, Icons, and Banners

With 8 new story events, 3 vehicles, 3 career events, and a huge list of new circuit customization options, can you brave the cold and come out on top?

Those with GRID Legends: Deluxe Edition get instant access to Ajeet’s Winter Bash*. Deluxe Edition players can invite friends to play the pack’s content for free**. Additionally, Winter Bash can be purchased separately.

Here’s everything that’s included:

legal_notice:
*REQUIRES GRID LEGENDS (SOLD SEPARATELY) & ALL GAME UPDATES.
**Access available to friend(s) during session that Deluxe Edition owner plays.
© 2022 Electronic Arts Inc. GRID and Codemasters are trademarks of Electronic Arts Inc.
name: GRID Legends: Winter Bash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130, AMD FX4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950, AMD RADEON RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 8600k, AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080, AMD RX590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: It’s the season to party! Pick your favorite car and jump in.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support
